param.name: gidCol
param.label: Column number for GID in phenotype file
param.help: (integer) Select column number which contains the GID

param.name: keyVariables
param.label: Column to select as Grouping Factor
param.help: For single grouping factor, input single number (example: if grouping factor is in the 3rd column of the phenotype file, input). For multiple grouping factors, input comma-separated values (example: 1,4,10 for columns 1,4 and 10)

param.name: phenoRowStart
param.label: Row start number for observations in Phenotype File
param.help: (integer) Select row number where observations start.
